review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2019
name: queenmonique
title: Bad invention.
review: Silk Almonmilk yogurt alternative is terrible tasting. Reminds me of consistency of Milk Of Magnesia. So Gross. I do not recommend this product at all.I really am not that fussy, but this is just disgusting. It said Dark chocolate coconut. It was the color of tan with no chocolate tasting at all or even coconut for that matter. Save your money don't buy it or better yet get Fage now thats a delicious yogurt. I will never experiment again. Staying with what is delicious.

title: great price for the best dairy alternative available
review: By far my favorite of all alternative milk yogurts out there. The texture is spot on when you want it to hold fresh fruit and granola. Even better if you like thick, rich smoothies with a yogurt tang to them. Also great as a substitute in vegan recipes!
